attributes.action: to the cut the tax on fuel and stop garages putting up the price of  of disel and petrol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the goverment have said it will not put up car fuel prices but the garages still are putting their prices up by 2 pence and 3 pence every week.gorden brown needs to stop this now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
